alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 3:19PM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Southern Troup County in west central Georgia... Northwestern Harris County in west central Georgia... * Until 400 PM EST. * At 318 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fredonia to Chambers County Lake to Oak Bowery, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, River View, Mountville, Cannonville, Odessadale, Stovall, Piedmont Heights, Big Springs, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Whitesville-Pine Lake and Long Cane. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for west central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
